entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
